column5: My wife and I are living in a modern two bedroom, two bathroom apartment.  HIGHLIGHTS: -Private bathroom with a huge modern shower -WiFi included -Easy and free street parking (Pay attention to signs, though) -LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION -Rooftop Access -We provide towels, bed linens,hair dryer,iron, and iron board.  We will share: -Spacious living room -Also the large rooftop: so you can enjoy a quite time with a view and a glass of wine perhaps. -Sorry no cooking in the kitchen
